content: my users were unable to get their registrations completed because the mail server supposed to send out the confirmations refused to do so. how can i trigger them all to be send again now that i fixed the config?

eg
/var/log/zulip/send_email.log says
2018-12-17 06:24:08,159 INFO Sending confirm_registration email to ['user@example.com']
and /var/log/zulip/errors.log says
2018-12-17 06:24:08.750 ERR [] Error in accounts_home: {'user@example.com': (553, b'5.7.1 <noreply-1213121121313131@chat.example.com>: Sender address rejected: not owned by user mymailuser')}
